name: Mariya Savchenko
coverLetter:
I have experience working on various cannabis farms doing different tasks such as trimming, watering, plant propagation maintenance and care.  I have been a part of small and large growing operations in different parts of Oregon for a few years. I feel comfortable working in busy hectic environments, performing repetitive tasks, and sitting or standing for long periods of time. I am very organized and can focus well while also being able to multi task. I have great communication skills and I am sure to always be informative and respectful of people. 
I have my own transportation and am available for a full time position. I am also flexible in terms of hours and days.My OLCC application is currently being processed.
